name: Rex
description: Rex is an oscilloscope-themed robot that is part of the WebtrES club. With a sturdy soldier box body and strong foundry arms and legs, Rex is ready for any challenge. Its screen displays an adorable cat image, adding a touch of charm to its design. To top it off, Rex sports a pair of stylish shades, giving it a cool and mysterious look. With its unique appearance and advanced functionality, Rex is a true standout among its fellow WebtrES club members.
